Name: Ladder Larry
About the game: It doesn't get more retro and arcady than this! Playing as Ladder Larry, you need to gather all the collectibles on each level to progress in the game. Climb the ladders and avoid the different monsters. Use special bonuses to aid you in your difficult task. It is right back to the arcade machines of the 80's. You will compete against all other Steam players to climb the 4 leaderboards and be the name on the top spot! Fight your way through 40 levels with increasing difficulty and nifty retro graphics to be the ultimate ladder climber!
